tag_list: t1s, bonded-t1s, hosted-voice, sip, pri, mpls, dsl
overview:
Willia Martin specializes in building business communications infrastructures that are secure, reliable, affordable, and easily expanded.

Most businesses need expandable broadband technology that is reliable and fast. Point-to-point technology is usually slow and less secure than having an MPLS when multible locations are involved. I can offer discount pricing on T1 lines,and bonded t1 linesand give a no-risk offer along with free one month of service. Hosted voice with free Cisco IP Phones, Sip truncing, PRI and analog voice, and as stated MPLS with zero start up along with free equipment and free installation.
